subject: Clarifying the concept of TDD
msgSnippet: ... How many of the books on TDD have you already read? How many of the web sites on TDD have you already explored? What part of TDD is unclear to you? -- J.
messageBody:
Richa Agarwal, Noida wrote:

> Can u pls clarify me the concept of TDD?

How many of the books on TDD have you already read? How many of the web
sites on TDD have you already explored? What part of TDD is unclear to you?
--
